professional experience.project__description: The ABR is one of 24 medical boards in the United States. As a full-stack software developer, I have been primarily responsible for RADS, an exam-creation application meant to serve 16,000 volunteers and the committees that oversee their efforts.
project__accomplishments: From mockups or written requirements, I built feature components and full workflows for numerous organizational roles, working with equal comfort in the API and UI.

These workflows included exam question creation, image upload and in-browser editing, and tracking the progress of proposed exam material from its creation through a multi-phase, multi-role approval process.

I initiated a major refactoring session to reduce the complexity of the flux store, trim bloated API responses, and eliminate dead code. This resulted in 81 insertions, 2436 deletions, and a much more maintainable codebase.
